title: Volvo Working On PHEVs With 100-Mile Range
description:
At the introduction of the new Volvo EX60, the company let it be known it is working on plug-in hybrids that will be more like electric cars.

The post Volvo Working On PHEVs With 100-Mile Range appeared first on CleanTechnica.
